title: Add full Nigerian bank list for bank-withdrawal payout method selection

requirements.text: Create a maintained static list of Nigerian banks in the frontend and use it as the selectable options source for payout-method creation.

quotes: I want all Nigeria banks to added available for user to make a withdraw into their bank account Nigeria bank available

acceptanceCriteria: A new frontend config/module exists that exports an array of Nigerian bank names (strings) suitable for use in UI Select components.
The list is used by all payout-method creation UIs (not duplicated inline in components).

requirements.text: Update the payout-method creation UI in the "Send to Bank" sheet to select a Nigerian bank from a dropdown (with search) instead of free-text entry, while still storing the selected bank name in the existing payout method fields.

quotes: I want all Nigeria banks to added available for user to make a withdraw into their bank account Nigeria bank available

acceptanceCriteria: In the SendToBankSheet add-method step, the "Bank Name" field is a Select-based dropdown populated from the Nigerian banks list.
Users can search/filter the bank dropdown to quickly find a bank name.
Submitting a new payout method stores the selected bank name and it appears correctly in the payout-method list/selection step afterward.

requirements.text: Update the payout-method creation UI on the Withdrawals page to select a Nigerian bank from a dropdown (with search) instead of free-text entry, while preserving the existing backend payload shape (bankName/accountName/accountNumber).

quotes: I want all Nigeria banks to added available for user to make a withdraw into their bank account Nigeria bank available

acceptanceCriteria: On the Withdrawals page "Add Payout Method" form, the "Bank Name" field is a Select-based dropdown populated from the Nigerian banks list.
Users can search/filter the bank dropdown to quickly find a bank name.

Creating a payout method from this page continues to succeed without any backend changes and the selected bank name is displayed in "Your Payout Methods" and in the withdrawal request form payout-method picker.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing shadcn components instead).
Keep the backend single-actor architecture; do not introduce additional canisters/services.
nonGoals: Adding third-party APIs to fetch Nigerian banks dynamically.
Adding bank verification (e.g., account number/name resolution) or payment rails integration.
Changing backend payout method or withdrawal request schemas.
